t2.spine.communication.android
Class AndroidMessage

java.lang.Object
  net.tinyos.message.Message
      t2.spine.communication.android.AndroidMessage
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable
public class AndroidMessage
extends Message

This is the encapsulation of messages send to/from sensor nodes for Android.

Author:
scott.coleman

Construct

public static AndroidMessage Construct(byte[] rawsfmessage)
Construct a SpineTOSMessage from a raw SERIAL ACTIVE MESSAGE from the AndroidBTService (which looks like a Serial Forwarder to us).
